The company management includes Anil Kumar Gupta - Chairman & Managing Director, Yash Vardhan - Director, P Alli Rani - Director - Finance, Arvind Bhatnagar - Director, Manoj K Akhouri - Director, Sudhir Mathur - Director, Pradeep Bhatnagar - Director, M P Shorawala - Director, N Madhusudana Rao - Part Time Govt.Director, V Kalyana Rama - Director - Projects & Services.
